relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.heent: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops or rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi, upper respiratory tract coarse.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, normoactive bowel sounds, no palpable masses. RLQ slightly distended and very tender to palpation with focal guarding and minimal rebound. Palpation of left upper/lower quadrant radiated to RLQ tenderness. RUQ tenderness to palpation without rebound or guarding.
relevant_findings.digital_rectal_exam: Normal tone, no gross or occult blood, no palpable masses, external hemorrhoids present.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused, pulses palpable bilaterally.
